entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 33 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:25 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:25 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25. POP 30%
